Load cran.toc

Source: R/load.cran.toc.R
load.cran.toc.Rd

Load a data.frame listing all CRAN packages, with their dependencies and publication date.

load.cran.toc(update.toc = FALSE)

Arguments

update.toc

logical (defaults to FALSE). Should cran.toc be updated from the server if it already exists locally.

Value

(invisibly) TRUE/FALSE depending on the success/failure of this operation.

See also

update_cran.toc_if.needed

Examples

# \donttest{
groundhogR:::load.cran.toc()
# }
